channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: AP photos show the terror of Southern California wildfires and the crushing aftermath
item.description: Before the wildfire comes a decision: what to save. It often comes down to “the smallest things,” Dawn Deleon told ABC7.

item.title: Bribery case adds to problems in Mississippi city with water woes and policing disputes
item.description: Bribery and conspiracy charges against the mayor of Jackson, Mississippi, are the latest shock to the state’s capital city.

item.title: Democratic US Sen. Jacky Rosen is reelected in Nevada, securing battleground seat
item.description: U.S. Sen. Jacky Rosen of Nevada has won reelection. The Democrat won her second term over Republican challenger Sam Brown, who was endorsed by President-elect Donald Trump.
